    edit_path(path) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/mini_portile2/mini_portile.rb, line 18
def edit_path(path)
  if proxy?
    if path.start_with?("ftp://") || use_ssl?
      path
    else
      "http://#{addr_port}#{path}"
    end
  else
    path
  end
end
